scripts.build-cordova: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova build
scripts.build-cordova-ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova build ios
scripts.cordova-ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova run ios
scripts.build-cordova-android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova build android
scripts.build-cordova-android-release: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova build android --release
scripts.cordova-android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova run android
